Create listinfo object

Source: R/sp_list.R
create_list_info.Rd

Helper function to create a listInfo object for use internally by create_sp_list(). See: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/listinfo?view=graph-rest-1.0

Usage

create_list_info(
  template = c("documentLibrary", "genericList", "task", "survey", "announcements",
    "contacts"),
  content_types = NULL,
  hidden = NULL,
  call = caller_env()
)

Arguments

template

Type of template to use in creating the list.

content_types

Optional. Set TRUE for contentTypesEnabled to be enabled.

hidden

Optional. Set TRUE for list to be hidden.
